challenge.expandedwins.info: Wins in Versus and Tournament matches count toward this challenge.
challenge.prize.info: Prize cards taken for Knock Outs resulting from attacks, Abilities, and Special Conditions count toward this challenge.
com.direwolfdigital.cake.data.achievemen: Do 3,000 damage to opposing Pokémon in Expanded matches.
Take 42 Prize cards in Expanded matches.
com.direwolfdigital.cake.data.products.b: Thank you for attending your local Pokémon League! This code will unlock a foil Xerneas promo card and an XY—Steam Siege themed deck box for you to enjoy or trade!
com.direwolfdigital.cake.rules.abilities: Flip a coin. If heads, attach a basic Energy card from your discard pile to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.
Discard a {R} Energy attached to this Pokémon.
product.gameplay.deckbox.pikachumonocolo: Keep things interesting by storing your completed custom deck in one of these awesome deck boxes. This deck box can be used on any custom deck. This deck box is tradable.
product.gameplay.sleeve.pikachumonocolor: Add a new dimension to your gameplay with Pokémon card sleeves. These card sleeves can be used on any custom deck. These card sleeves are tradable.
